Direct Known Subclasses:

public class Similarity
extends java.lang.Object

FOLDOC Machine Learning Comparison class - to generate and contain the results of a compare algorithm

Version:
0.4
Author:
Trent Apted
See Also:
Connection.ratioSimilar1(HashGraph g1, HashGraph g2, PrintStream log)

public Similarity(DistanceFunc dist,

Create a Similarity with base logic using dist and pen

pen - the penalty function to use [default: new PenaltyFunc()]

Method Detail

compare

public double compare(HashGraph left,
                      HashGraph right)
Compare left to right using this Simliarity function.

The detailed results of the comparison are loaded into the public data members/fields of this class

Parameters:
left - the 'left' model
right - the 'right' model
Returns:
the final comparison result
